name: Black Bean Quesadilla
preparation: Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner. Preheat oven to 400Â° F.
Meanwhile, in bowl, stir together mayonnaise with dip mix. Set aside.
Arrange tortillas on pan. Spread dip on half of each tortilla. Top with beans and cheese, then fold tortillas over filling.
Bake for 10 min or until cheese melts and tortillas are light golden.
Meanwhile, prepare salsa. Dice tomato; place in a bowl and stir in salsa mix. Using the 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in 1 tsp lime juice. Stir to mix.
Cut tortillas into wedges and serve with salsa.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups sliced vegetables, your choice.
